title: Ocean Protocol
description:
Conceptualizing and executing the creative and visual direction of the Ocean Protocol brand. Leading the UI design & development of all Ocean Protocol web properties. 

Initial website in collaboration with [Balance](https://balance.io/).

title: ezeep
